articles.content: An interesting event took place during India women's cricket team's first Commonwealth Games 2022 match against Australia at Edgbaston in Birmingham on Friday. India opener Shafali Varma was way outs… [+1903 chars]

articles.title: Buttler and Livingstone sign up for CSA's new T20 league - ESPNcricinfo
